261740.<pc>は 灯台のてっぺんから\nディゼルを 捜してみた！:
<pc> tried to find Diezel from the
top of the lighthouse!

261743.「チッ……お前か。何の用だ。: Oh...it's you. What do you want?

261744.ディゼルに 星月夜の秘薬を渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give Diezel the Starry Night Remedy?<yesno><close>

261745.「おい。何か隠してるのは わかってるんだ。\n ふざけてないで とっとと出せ。:
Hey. I know you're hiding something. Stop
messing around and get me out of here.

261746.ディゼルに 星月夜の秘薬を渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Give Diezel the Starry Night Remedy?<yesno><close>

261747.<pc>は ディゼルに\n星月夜の秘薬を渡した。:
<pc> gave Diezel the Starry Night
Remedy.

261749.「……なるほど アガサに頼まれたのか。: ...I see...Agatha asked you to do this.

261750.ディゼルは 星月夜の秘薬を 一気に飲み干した！:
Diezel gulps down the Starry Night Remedy in
one gulp!

261751.「助かった。一応 礼を言っておいてやる。: Thank you. I thank you in advance.

261752.「……ずいぶん アガサに\n 気に入られたみたいだな。: ...It seems Agatha has taken a liking to you.

261753.「お前も ここまで 首をつっこんだんだ。\n 俺のことを…… 俺たちの復讐のこと:
You've gone this far. I should tell you about
me... about our vendetta.

261755.「俺たちは ガキのころ あの魔族の男……\n ウィーヌムに 両親を殺されたんだ。:
When we were kids, our parents were killed by
that demon man, Weenum.

261756.「あの日……俺は 両親とケンカして\n 家を飛び出した。なぜ あんなに怒っていた:
That day... I got into a fight with my parents
and ran away from home. I don't remember why I
was so Angry.

261757.「外でしばらく頭を冷やし ふたりに謝ろうと\n 家へ戻った。そうしたら……\n:
I went outside to cool off for a while, then
went back to the house to apologize to them.
Then... he suddenly appeared in front of us.

261758.「ヤツは 俺たち家族に 絶望をまき散らし\n 苦しみのどん底に 追いこんだ。:
He has driven our family to the depths of
despair and suffering.

261759.「俺とアガサは 生き延びることができたが\n 両親は 助からなかった。気がついた:
Agatha and I survived, but my parents did not.
I found the remains of my mother and father
lying in front of me.

261760.「ヤツは 俺を見下ろして ニヤニヤと\n 楽しそうに 笑っていたよ。\n 何か:
He was looking down at me and smiling happily.
As if he was watching some funny show.

261761.「もうどんなに願ったって ふたりに謝れない。\n 涙が 悲しみが 絶望が 憎悪が:
No matter how much I wished, I could never apologize to them again. Tears, sorrow, despair, hatred... flooded my eyes, and I
couldn't stop.

261762.「許せなかった。\n 大切な両親を 奪ったウィーヌムが。\n 家族を守れなかった:
I couldn't forgive Winnum for taking my
parents from me. I couldn't protect them by
myself...

261763.「そのときに 誓ったんだ。\n この手で 絶対に 殺してやる。:
That's when I swore. I will definitely kill
you with my own hands.

261764.「俺たちが味わった以上の 痛みと絶望を\n あの男にも 味わわせてやると……。:
I thought I'd give that man more pain and
despair than we've all endured.

261765.「……その後 ある魔剣士によって\n 俺たちは 救われた。俺は その人から\n:
After that, we were saved by a demon
swordsman. I want everything I have as a demon
swordsman from him.

261766.「俺は ヤツを殺すためだけに 生きてきた。\n 幾多のダークネスを狩り 強くなっ:
I lived only to kill him. I've hunted many
Darknesses. I've grown stronger.

261767.「今度こそ 逃がしはしない。\n 復讐をとげてみせる……。:
This time, you will not escape. I will have my
revenge...

261768.「……少し しゃべりすぎた。\n 俺は 先に つるぎの酒場へ戻る。じゃあな。:
I talked a little too much. I'm going back to
Tsurugi's Tavern first. See you later.
